sentence.Network_en: As they do, the riskiness of the system steadily increases.
sentence.Network_cn: 因此他们乐于更多地借贷.

sentence.Network_en: Small town banks have to assess the relative riskiness of threir loans.
sentence.Network_cn: 小城市的银行必须预估他们贷款相当的冒险.

sentence.Network_en: The markets and regulators use ratings to determine the riskiness of an asset.
sentence.Network_cn: 市场与监管者都利用评级来确定一项资产的风险水平.
